data: We are an IT consultancy focused on building secure, dependable platforms and data systems. Our team combines hands-on engineering with clear, practical guidance so your teams can deliver faster without compromising security or reliability.
data.focus-areas#Focus areas:
IT Security
Threat modeling, hardening, identity and access management, security reviews, and automation that makes security repeatable.
DevOps Engineering
CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, observability, incident readiness, and operational excellence that keeps services stable.
Data Engineering
Data ingestion, transformation, quality controls, and platform reliability so data is trusted and accessible.
data.how-we-work#How we work: We start by understanding your current setup and risk profile, then define a clear roadmap. We can embed with your team or lead a focused engagement, always aiming for measurable outcomes and knowledge transfer.
data.what-we-do#What we do: Strengthen security posture across infrastructure, applications, and data. Design and operate resilient cloud and on-prem systems. Build data platforms that are governed, observable, and ready for analytics.
